data.comment: The match is underway in Turin.
Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, Fabrizio Pasqua awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Bologna.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Torino have a goal kick.
Mattias Svanberg hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Bologna in Turin.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Torino.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 14, Federico Bonazzoli for Torino drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 17, Bologna push upfield and Danilo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Torino defence.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Torino push forward at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino and Andrea Belotti gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
In the minute 19, Torino's Tomas Rincon misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 20, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Torino.
Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Andrea Belotti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Torino.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Bologna.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Torino advance rapidly upfield but Fabrizio Pasqua blows for offside.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Torino.
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicolas Dominguez (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 27, In Turin, Bologna push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Federico Bonazzoli.
Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Simone Verdi.
In the minute 30, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Bologna throw-in in Torino's half.
Torino are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lyanco for Torino has been booked by Fabrizio Pasqua and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
Bologna drive upfield and Emanuel Vignato gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Torino defender.
In the minute 37, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Torino.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Torino.
Torino's Armando Izzo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Bologna a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Torino to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Torino are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Turin.
Torino's Andrea Belotti gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bologna defender.
Torino drives forward and Andrea Belotti gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
The second-half is underway in Turin.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Bologna push upfield but Fabrizio Pasqua quickly pulls them for offside.
Torino to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Torino in the half of Bologna.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Torino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Torino in the half of Bologna.
Mattias Svanberg (Bologna) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Emanuel Vignato (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 58, Tomas Rincon (Torino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Simone Verdi of Torino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Musa Barrow of Bologna gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Torino a goal kick.
Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a first substitution, with Mitchell Dijks replacing Lorenzo De Silvestri.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 63, Jerdy Schouten is replacing Nicolas Dominguez for the away team.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Important block from the Bologna defence as Andrea Belotti fires in a strike for Torino.
Bologna pushes forward through Musa Barrow, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 66, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Bologna's Roberto Soriano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Marco Giampaolo is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Soualiho Meite replacing Amer Gojak.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Bologna.
Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Bologna throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 68, Bologna will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Torino.
Takehiro Tomiyasu is booked for the away team.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Simone Verdi.
In the minute 71, Free kick Torino.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 73, The match at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino has been interrupted briefly for a check on Armando Izzo, who is down injured.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Izzo is back on the pitch.
In the minute 75, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In Turin, Mattias Svanberg of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 76, Rodrigo Palacio for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 77, In Turin Bologna drive forward through Musa Barrow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Andrea Poli is replacing Mattias Svanberg for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Roberto Soriano gets an equalizer for Bologna. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 78, Great play from Emanuel Vignato to set up the goal.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 82, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Simone Verdi for Torino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Simone Verdi is back on his feet again.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua waits before resuming play because Armando Izzo for Torino is still down.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Torino.
In the minute 85, Torino's Armando Izzo is back in action after a slight knock.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Bologna's Jerdy Schouten gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) has taken off Armando Izzo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mergim Vojvoda is the replacement.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Free kick Torino.
Torino are pushing forward but Tomas Rincon's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
